original_text: I will make more and more people and animals live on you. They will give birth to many young ones, so that they grow in number. I will cause many people to live on you, as they did a long time ago. I will help you with more good things than you had when you first became a land for my people. Then you will know that I am the Lord.
korean_text: 내가 너희 위에 사람과 짐승을 많게 하되 그들의 수가 많고 번성하게 할 것이라 너희 전 지위대로 사람이 거주하게 하여 너희를 처음보다 낫게 대우하리니 내가 여호와인 줄을 너희가 알리라

sentences.original_text: I will make more and more people and animals live on you.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희 위에 더 많은 사람들과 동물들이 살게 하리라.

sentences.original_text: They will give birth to many young ones,
so that they grow in number.
I will cause many people to live on you,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 많은 사람들을 너희 위에 살게 하리라,

sentences.original_text: as they did a long time ago.
I will help you with more good things
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희를 더 좋은 것들로 도우리라,

sentences.original_text: than you had when you first became a land for my people.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 처음 내 백성의 땅이 되었을 때보다 더 많이.

sentences.original_text: Then you will know that I am the Lord.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하면 너희가 내가 여호와인 줄 알리라.
